name: Sour Pale with Strawberriees
description: Part of our Barn Phantom (Sour) Series and part of our Waiting On Wood (Barrel-aged) Series. This Belgian-style Pale Ale that has been appropriately soured with lactobacillus acidophilus providing green apple, tart cherry, grapefruit and even apricot notes. Then the ale is infused with fresh strawberries to provide another layer of sophistication to the flavor profile!
